跳过导航链接
  • 概览
  • 树
  • 索引
  • 搜索
  • 帮助

    所有类和接口

    类
    说明
    Angle
    Represents an angle with its degree value and determined angle type.
    AngleType
    Enumerates the different types of angles for the angle recognition task.
    Compound
    Bonus 1: Compound Shape Area Calculation Allows users to select a compound shape and calculate its area.
    Constants
    Utility class containing constant values used throughout the Shapeville application.
    EndPanel
    The EndPanel class represents the screen displayed at the end of a user session.
    Feedback
    Represents the feedback provided to the user after they submit an answer to a task problem.
    HomeScreenPanel
    The HomeScreenPanel class represents the initial screen of the Shapeville application.
    ImageLoader
    Utility class for loading and scaling images from resources.
    MainApp
    Main entry point for the Shapeville v3 application.
    MainFrame
    The main application window (JFrame) for Shapeville v3.
    NavigationBar
    The NavigationBar class represents the top navigation bar of the Shapeville application.
    Problem
    A generic container for the data representing a single problem or question presented to the user in a task.
    ScoreManager
    Manages the user's score and progress within the Shapeville application session.
    Sector
    Bonus 2: Sector Area Calculation Allows users to choose a sector and calculate its area.
    Shape
    Represents a geometric shape with its name, image path, and type.
    Task1Panel2D
    Task 1 Panel for 2D Shape Recognition.
    Task1Panel3D
    Task 1 Panel for 3D Shape Recognition.
    Task2Panel
    Task 2 Panel for Angle Recognition.
    Task3Panel
    Task 3 Panel for Area Calculation of basic shapes (Rectangle, Parallelogram, Triangle, Trapezium).
    Task4Panel
    Task 4 Panel for Circle Area and Circumference calculations.
    TaskDefinition
    Defines the metadata for a specific task within the Shapeville application.
    TaskLogic
    A placeholder interface for defining the logic required by various tasks.
    TaskManager
    Manages the sequence and logic flow of different tasks within the Shapeville application.
    TaskPanel
    Interface defining the contract for all Task UI Panels in the Shapeville application.
